entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:36 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 09:17 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this morning. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
